text:
Using the default publication...

I can use the BXE asset screen to upload assets and they do upload into the file
structure, show up in the "site" tab but the asset screen popup will not then
show me the assets that have been previously inserted.

No javascript errors.
Nothing in the HTML source suggesting its a rendering problem (it just doesn't
have anything to do with the uploaded assets)

Can't find anything really noticeable in the logs but if it helps I am running

latest cvs
debian testing
mozilla
creator: ps@nomensa.com
ps@nomensa.com
text:
Got the screens mixed up. They show up in the assets popup but *not* the isnert
image popup

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
insert image filters all assets and only shows you .gif, .jpg and .png

does that explain it?
